alert.note: Alert for Deerlodge, Western Beaverhead National Forest; Eastern Beaverhead National Forest (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 03 at 6:49AM MDT until September 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * Affected area: Fire Zone 110 (Deerlodge/West Beaverhead). Fire Zone 111 (East Beaverhead). * Impacts: The combination of gusty winds, low humidity, and an unstable atmosphere will result in critical fire weather conditions this afternoon through Sunday afternoon. Very poor RH recoveries and gusty winds will continue through tonight. * Winds: For today, southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 45 mph. For Sunday, west winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 40 mph. * Minimum humidities: 5 to 12 percent. * Haines: For today, 6 High. For Sunday, 5 Moderate. &&

area.areaDesc: Deerlodge, Western Beaverhead National Forest; Eastern Beaverhead National Forest
